item.title: Mind Your Step (by Step): Chain-of-Thought can Reduce Performance on Tasks where Thinking Makes Humans Worse
item.description: Chain-of-thought prompting can hurt LLMs’ performance on tasks where human deliberation worsens accuracy; this research identifies those tasks and offers a new tool for prompt design.
